refnamediv.refpurpose: Gets time of last page modification

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: Returns the time of the last modification of the current page. The value returned is a Unix timestamp, suitable for feeding to date. Returns &false; on error.

example.title: getlastmod example
example.programlisting:
<?php
// outputs e.g. 'Last modified: March 04 1998 20:43:59.'
echo "Last modified: " . date ("F d Y H:i:s.", getlastmod());
?>

note.simpara: If you're interested in getting the last modification time of a different file, consider using filemtime.

refsect1.para: See also date, getmyuid, getmygid, get_current_user, getmyinode, getmypid, and filemtime.
